title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table in the software show different formats when displayed in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. The data and text item display the same format, but the dynamic text item displays a different format.
EB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, both the dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the same format for consistency.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Input 'new Date()' as the content for three items in the table.
2. Save and preview the table.
Expected result: The dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the same format for the datetime values.
